post.body: Precisely-- Amazon mobile web is a beautiful site.
ohhhyeaaah
Few times I've been down that track.

things are going fine..just loving married life and working. Also, ministry and freelancing. Pretty busy!
Woo! How's school going man? Hecka busy?
that sounds interesting. How is it?
dude I had food poisoning last thanksgiving. Feel for you bro!
For that !important hack -- yeah, it's great to hide things from IE6 when you don't have a separate stylesheet.
drop opacity/fill + tweak blending modes. You could also add a layer mask and paint the mask with a black brush set to 20%...
TACO BUENO!
NM--found it. It's under Edit > Mode > Freehand editing. Thanks for your help :P
in TM, I think I switched a setting that makes the cursor go wherever I click. I want it to be at the end of a line. Know how?
You'll have to let me see it when it's ready. What is it? Or is it under wraps?
Internet Explorer. Doing browser testing.
http://www.typographyserved.com/ & http://www.patterntap.com
For Sarnoff, we shooting for the tomorrow deadline?
If you want people to say 'Dan' -- just tell them your name is Darren. When I do, they always say, "Okay, Thank you Dan."
this ain't a scene...
There's a way to import your own samples, right? Dude I'm trying to be Kanye/Dj Premier/Nujabes!
those are slick man!
ooh yyeeah
no problemo -- you been having a busy week?
'whois google.com' -- that what you're looking for?
Any idea why JQuery might be slowing down my site in FF2 ? Also, slidedowns are reallll slow. Any ideas?
good luck man!
I hope another how-to series comes out of this conversation
are you kidding? The wicked, worn look has been so well received, it's transitioned into apparel.
Hopefully only looking. Their prices are atrocious!
I was completely off. In all honesty, I am a complete movie ignoramus.
Horton Hears A Who!
thanks for the spyware link! >:} You notice that? Click around a bit and you'll get some .exe downloadin' goin' on.
you asked :D Also, took French in high school. Trés chic!
that would be trois
to eat, or make beats--that is the real question.
I'm doing fine. I'm free to work on it whenever you need me. Are there a lot of changes?
Sorry, that was me. Practicing a new spell.
Sup Clayton?
MGMT is always good--it's likely that's been suggested though. For lighter groove stuff, try Thievery Corporation.
Exactly. It's definitely Monday over here in my office. Literally and figuratively. Battling a head cold, too.
960 is what's hot man. When Cameron Moll says it's unstoppable, then Google listens (view sidebar): http://cameronmoll.com/
I don't think it's online, but I know you can rent it. It was a short TV series HBO did. Pretty fascinating.
You ever seen the John Adams series from HBO?
Gosh, you're going? I wish I was going now.
http://twitter.com/macrumors -- they always do live coverage of the big events.
I know what you mean about working hard. Been working on a redesign of my portfolio site all day! Does Rhemasoul need a site?
Ahhhh right. My bad. Well.. there's always band :D Or my personal favorite, Beat Maker (soo powerful).
Pano is a photo panoramic-stitching app for the iPhone -- that photo was created from 7 photos. It's really sweet.
You'll be suprised man..there's a lot of fun, useful free apps. Pano is one definitely worth buying: http://tinyurl.com/6v65kc
Dude--you'll love it. Having slick apps on your portable device is like having a sweet portable gaming system. What apps you like?
Hey Marc! You have a nice holiday?
Yeah, such is life when you got a bomb freeware font. Besides, it's overused to us, but our clients sure like it!
Same here. It was sweet walking out with cash every night.
Yup--I have noticed that. It's a great font.
Editing client-supplied content is not unlike proof-reading an English paper. Except this paper has decoded HTML entities.
Okay, who's the guy who put two Doctypes in this hypertext document?
The Simpsons visit a 'Mapple' Store: http://tinyurl.com/5mud9o
Pepperoni pizza again?
I'll take three fish tacos please. And a street taco.
Working from a coffee shop today. Nice change of scenery!
As the old adage goes: "It's much faster to fill-in a blank set of html elements than erase and fill-in."
Think you're pretty good at eyeing things? http://woodgears.ca/eyeball/
Even my image-replaced markup is semantic.
Settling into the last workday of the week. Lots to do!

Just switched over to VMware from Parallels. So far, very smooth. UI is better/more lightweight. Now, just to reactivate.. Stupid XP!

Textmate users: You know about the control + enter <br> snippet? I edited mine to make it compliant (bundle editor). Saves lots of ...

Working at Starbucks with my wonderful wife. Conversations about family and scholastic aptitude within earshot.

Santa, please bring me BeatMaker Drum Sampler for iPhone: http://tinyurl.com/68vbkb
I can't believe it's almost two weeks until Christmas.
Setting up camp at the local Starbucks.
I'm going to go beat hollow tubs with wooden sticks now.
With my window open, I can hear the rain pouring and feel the brisk air. Perfect atmosphere for marking-up. I ♥ #textmate

I've caught a cold.
It's You I live for, everyday

I am not ashamed to say that I am watching "What Not To Wear" with my wife. I'm also not ashamed to say that I like it.
A Voice calls from the wind--i'm heading further in...
"He did what in his cup?"
